mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Comment (commentContent, commentDate, userNumber, feedNumber) VALUES (#{commentContent}, now(), #{userNumber}, #{feedNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT c.feedNumber, c.commentNumber, c.commentContent, c.commentDate, u.userID, u.userNickName, u.saveFolder, u.userPhotoName FROM User AS u INNER JOIN ( SELECT feedNumber, userNumber, commentNumber, commentContent, commentDate FROM Comment WHERE feedNumber = #{feedNumber} ) AS c ON u.userNumber = c.userNumber
